subject: STRICTLY 2024 NEW PAYMENT NOTICE UPDATE AND GET BACK SIR. Attention:Mr.Ruby.
body:
Central Bank of Nigeria,

Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way
Central Business District,
Cadastral Zone,
Abuja, Federal Capital Territory,
Nigeria P.M.B. 0187,
Garki Abuja-Nigeria.

FROM THE DESK OF GOVERNOR , CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA.

RE: PROCESSING THE RELEASE OF YOUR PAYMENT VALUED AT US$14,500.000.00 
ONLY.

Attention:Mr.Ruby.

Dear Sir,

This office received your payment instructions to authenticate your 
claim as the rightful beneficiary of the said payment under this 2024  
for the next transfer into your providing account  to enable us commence 
immediately with the transfer of $14,500.000.00 ( Fourteen Million and 
Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars Only) while you are urgently 
advice to re=confirm immediately below information's to commence with 
the payment transfer are:

Your Name:
Your Address:
Your Number:
Include attached copy of your id.

Re-Confirm Your Bank Details below:

Bank Name:
Bank Address:
Bank Tel No:

Account Number:
Swift Code:
Routing Number:
Iban Number if any:
Account Name:
Account Address:

Looking forward to your response once receive this email message to 
serve you better.

Yours Faithfully,

Mr. Edward L. Adamu ,
Deputy Governor Central Bank of Nigeria(CBN).
Email:legal.remittanceunit@cntrlbk.org
Direct No:+ 234-90665-90867.

subject: Re: STRICTLY 2024 NEW PAYMENT NOTICE UPDATE AND GET BACK SIR. Attention:Mr.Guadalupe.
body:
Dear Mr. Edward L. Adamu,

Thank you for your email. However, I must inform you that I have not made any claims or transactions with the Central Bank of Nigeria. It seems there may be a misunderstanding or mistake.

Could you please provide more details about this claim and the supposed transfer of Fourteen Million and Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars? 

Also, for security reasons, I would prefer not to send a copy of my ID until I have more information about this matter.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Guadalupe

subject: STRICTLY 2024  PAYMENT  UPDATE  REPLY SIR. Attention:Mr.Guadalupe.
body:
Central Bank of Nigeria,
Plot 33, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way
Central Business District,
Cadastral Zone,
Abuja, Federal Capital Territory,
Nigeria P.M.B. 0187,
Garki Abuja-Nigeria.

FROM THE DESK OF GOVERNOR , CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA.

RE: PROCESSING THE RELEASE OF YOUR PAYMENT VALUED AT US$14,500.000.00 
ONLY.

Attention:Mr.Guadalupe.

Dear Sir,

This office sincerely acknowledges the receipts of your dated email with 
its content duly noted towards your funds approved for next transfer 
into your providing account details as soon as possible under the law.

However, we received an instructions of your payment as unpaid 
beneficiary whose hi name was listed for payment transfer into your 
account for onward confirming within next 72 Hrs. the transfer is made 
since the instructions has been given and would advise to comply with 
your claim directions to enable us do the needful without any delay by 
to re=confirm immediately below information's to commence with the 
payment transfer process are:

Your Name:
Your Address:
Your Number:

Re-Confirm Your Bank Details below:

Bank Name:
Bank Address:
Bank Tel No:
Account Number:
Swift Code:
Routing Number:
Iban Number if any:
Account Name:
Account Address:

Looking forward to your response once receive this email message to 
serve you better and also be rest assured that all the documentation 
will be process accordingly in your name as the rightful beneficiary for 
your bankers confirmations of the payment to avoid any issues of any 
kind with the Government for your good interest in conclusion.

Yours Faithfully,

Mr. Edward L. Adamu ,
Deputy Governor Central Bank of Nigeria(CBN).
Email:legal.remittanceunit@cntrlbk.org
Direct No:+ 234-90665-90867.
